item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit.K.Misra
item.description: "The wise are so totally detached, Pain is for those who are attached." -- Mohit.K.Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit.K.Misra
item.description: "The mystics,sages define poem or song as praise to the lord,When I write I hope I give justice accord" -- Mohit.K.Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Krishna
item.description: "The only way you can conquer me is through love and there I am gladly conquered" -- Krishna

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A human being is a part of the whole called by us universe, a part limited in time and space. He experiences himself, his thoughts and feeling as something separated from the rest, a kind of optical delusion of his consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from this prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "God does not play dice with the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Gopi Krishna
item.description: "One who sees inaction in action and action in inaction- he is a wise man." -- Gopi Krishna

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mohit add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit K. Misra
item.description: "Love unites and hate disintegrates." -- Mohit K. Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit K. Misra
item.description: "At the end to death I must go, Finishing a real tragic and funny show." -- Mohit K. Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit.K.Misra
item.description: "Being a poet one confronts the limitation of language, how can the spirit be revealed under any restrictions." -- Mohit.K.Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit Misra
item.description: "One conquers by getting conquered." -- Mohit Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit.K.Misra
item.description: "Who am I and why am I here? Has just become my greatest fear." -- Mohit.K.Misra

item.title: Mohit add a quote by Mohit.K.Misra
item.description: "What Albert Einstein termed optical delusion, The Indians termed Maya or Illusion." -- Mohit.K.Misra
